createPosition().details: User deposits ETH, 80% goes to Aave as collateral, 20% reserved for protection

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

triggerProtection(address).details: Called by ProtectionExecutor via Reactive Network callback

updateHealthFactor(address).details: Can be called by anyone to update position health

createPosition().notice: Create a leveraged position with liquidation protection

getHealthFactor().notice: Get current health factor for a user

triggerProtection(address).notice: Execute protection when health factor is low

updateHealthFactor(address).notice: Update and emit health factor for monitoring
